author: Pan Pylas
title: HALF BILLION MORE FACE POVERTY
description: HALF BILLION MORE FACE POVERTY (Main headline, 6th story, link ) Related stories: 100 DAYS EMOTIONAL TOLL RISES CUOMO WARNS 'NEW NORMAL' FEDS PLAN DATABASE OF INFECTED VIRUS SLAMS BLACK AMERICANS
content:
LONDON (AP) Around half a billion people could be pushed into poverty as a result of the economic fallout from the coronavirus pandemic unless richer countries take urgent action to help developing nations, a leading aid organization warned Thursday.
